content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I please have your name to get started?
Nice to meet you, Mary. Could you please provide your address so I can check if you're within our service area?
I live at 451 Lakeside Drive, Smalltown.
Thank you for that information, Mary. Let me quickly check if we're servicing your area.
I'm sorry, Mary, but it seems that your address is currently outside our service area. Unfortunately, we are unable to assist at this location. Is there anything else I may help you with today?
